data.title: MOHAMMED RIAZUDDIN
data.meta_description: MOHAMMED RIAZUDDIN - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. 1 MOHAMMED RIAZUDDIN +91 9966371427 ridzy92@hotmail.com EXPERIENCE Since 2014 M.Bhaskara Rao & Co – Hyderabad - Audit Executive  Statutory Audit and Tax Audit of Educational Societies, Construction, hotel and Insurance Companies by implementing the documentation of Hodgson Landau Brands (HLB) International.  Internal audit of Manufacturing, Software, Construction, Trading, Pharmaceutical, Power Generation Companies, Clubs and Hotel Industry, Stock Audit of Oil Manufacturing Company by reviewing internal control structures, perform special reviews, conduct internal audits, make recommendations for corrective actions of unsatisfactory conditions, report findings to the Board of Directors and senior management, assist with improvements in operations and reductions in costs, monitor vendor contracts for compliance with contractual terms, and review all applicable laws and regulations for all projects and operations  Special Assignment of Capitalization of a Power Company (TPCIL).  Special Audit of a manufacturing company to find the fraud of an employee.  E-Filing of income tax returns and preparation of tax returns of individuals and Firms.  Preparation and finalization of books of accounts of manufacturing companies. ARTICLESHIP TRAINING M.Bhaskara Rao & Co., Chartered Accountants 2011-2014: Joined in the firm as an Audit Intern and completed articleship training under the guidelines issued by “The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India” PROFILE Audit Executive with 1 year experience in a variety of auditing & accounting positions, including Statutory Audits, Tax Audits & Acting Supervisor of Internal Audit. Able to apply problem-solving skills, handle high pressure situations, adapt to changing situations, and maximize efficiency while minimizing costs. EDUCATION 2014 Chartered Accountant – Group 1 Institute of Chartered Accountants of India 2012 Bachelor of Commerce Acharya Nagarjuna University 2011 Chartered Accountant - IPCC 2009 Board of Intermediate Education 2007 Board of Secondary Education NOTABLE ACHIEVEMENT  Received Silver Medal for getting a distinction score in 10th standard.  Part of CSR team in Company. LEISURE INTEREST  Listening Music, Long Drives.  Playing Cricket, Basket Ball.  Swimming. 11 MASTE R OF COMPU TER APPLIC ATION ( M e n t i o n e d y o u r s p e c i a l i z a t i o n ) 2009 Bachelor Degree ( M e n t i o n e 11 MASTE R OF COMPU TER APPLIC ATION ( M e n t i o n e d y o u r s p e c i a l i z a t i o n ) 2009 Bachelor Degree ( M e n t i o n e d 11 MASTE R OF COMPU TER APPLIC ATION ( M e n t i o n e d y o u r s p e c i a l i z a t i o n ) 2009 11 MASTE R OF COMPU TER APPLIC ATION ( M e n t i o n e d y o u r s p e Hyderabad

2. 2 CLIENTS HANDLED  Statutory Corporation: Infrastructure Corporation of Andhra Pradesh Limited  Power Industry: Ind Barath Group, KVK Group, Thermal Power Corporation of India Limited.  Hotel Industry :Gayatri Hi-tech Hotels Limited (Park Hyatt Hyderabad)  Sugar Industry :NSL Sugars Limited, Gayatri Sugars Limited  Cement Industry: KCP Cements Ltd, Anjani Cements Ltd.  Trading Industry: R S Brothers Retail India Pvt. Ltd & Jewelers Pvt. Ltd  Construction Industry: Asia (Chennai) Engineering Company Private Limited, Janapriya Engineering Syndicate Limited, REPL.  Pharma Industry: Sai Life Sciences Ltd., Artisian Dental Private Limited and Advantage Dental Private limited.  Software Industry: Real Page India Pvt. Ltd.  Service Sector: Hyderabad Race Club  Educational Society: Sultan-Ul-Loom Education Society (Muffakham Jha Engineering College).  Insurance Company: Sri Ram Life Insurance SKILL & INTEREST PERSONAL INFORMATION Father’s Name : Mohammed Taquiuddin Pasha Date of Birth : May 13th , 1992 Status : Married Languages Known : English, Hindi, Telugu, and Urdu. Address : Pushpa Nilayam G2, D.No: 16-1-30/12, Lokayuktha Colony Road No.3, Saidabad Hyderabad – 500023.
